text: "Come Dancing" is a 1982 song by British band The Kinks and is the leading single from their 20th studio album State of Confusion. It went to number 6 in the United States and Canada, number 12 in the United Kingdom, number 4 in Ireland, number 36 in Australia and number 29 in the Netherlands. == References == Category:1982 songs Category:The Kinks songs Category:Pop rock songs
title: Come Dancing (song)
